case.title: [C1] Text input in message

custom.preconds:
[Description] Verification of the correctness of data entry into the Message console
[Preconditions] 1. The website is launched 2. Access to the Message panel
[Test data] SSss11:: __-$$%%>><<]}) // 2*
custom.steps: 1. Open a website 2. In "Menu List" press "Input Form" 3. Press "Simple Form Demo" 4. In the console "Please enter your Message", type [SSss11: __-$$%%>><<]}) // 2*]. 5. Press "Show Message"
custom.expected:
The application will display next to "Your Message" text: "SSss11: __-$$%%%>><<]}) // 2*"
[Final Result]
The application displayed next to the "Your Message" text: "SSss11: __-$$%%%>><<]}) // 2*"

[Test data] (Enter a): 2 (Enter b): 3

The application displayed next to the "Total a + b =" number: "5"
